channel.title: Unable to connect
channel.description: hello everyone, ive just got a problem and i need help. I have my server up and it get dos'd down, then when i try to logg back on after i have reset all connections and its says unable to connect. my thought is that someone has did something to keep my server running and is keeping it on and timed ou so that no one can connect. if you could help me out id appreciate it thanks

item.title: Unable to connect

item.description:

Have you reset your router?(if you have one) check that your ip hasn’t changed.

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to connect
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Vibes:

well my connection is timed out. everything was running smoothly till i got attacked then i reset everything and now the server is timed out so no connection can be made. could anything have been damages/corrupted during the initial takedown ? If someone can help me out id appreciate it.

Well if something was damaged it should show up when running the server, so maybe the attack is still going on?

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to connect
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

just kill the java process, if you believe that is the issue… although i highly doubt anyone has done ‘something to keep my (your) server running and is keeping it on’

Read full topic
